original_text: The king took his special ring from his finger and he gave it to Hammedatha's son, Haman, the Jews' great enemy.
korean_text: 왕이 반지를 손에서 빼어 유다인의 대적 곧 아각 사람 함므다다의 아들 하만에게 주며

sentences.original_text: The king took his special ring from his finger
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 그의 손가락에서 특별한 반지를 빼냈고

sentences.original_text: and he gave it to Hammedatha's son
